title: cant create a ranked lobby
body: everytime I want to create a ranked lobby it starts to load and after 30s it stops and takes me back to the league home screen so I cant start a game.

replies.body:
It seems that there may have been an issue that started about 1 or 2 hours ago that seem to be cleared up at this point.  

Is there anyone still experiencing this specific issue?  Reply back and let me know so we can take a look!
Still experiencing this issue.
Still experiencing this.
Still have the issue
I am also still experiencing the issue. I get instantly kicked to the main screen when i try to set up a ranked lobby.
I am still experiencing this issue as well. Repaired/restarted my client/computer and it appears to be account related.
im still having this issue
i am experiencing the issue at the moment, EUW "Dodko" summoner name please take a look, thanks in advance
same problem, and it lasts about a whold morning. plz fix it as soon as possible.
I am still experiencing this issue. Restarting client and repairing it doesn't work.
FIXED
how do u fix it?
same problem, and it lasts about a whold morning. plz fix it as soon as possible.
Same issue here. Nothing has been fixed.
I am have the exact same issue as well. Ranked Summoner's Rift Draft pick and Normal Draft Pick. All other modes including Hexakill work.
Been like this for over an hour now too
I got the same thing. Wont let me make a ranked game or a normal draft pick game. Ive repaired my client and nothing.
Yep having same issue how do I fix this? Its almost like the server thinks my account is still in a game so it wont let me make a lobby or join one!
Same thing.  I got lagged out of a ranked lobby and ever since i can't make a ranked game.  Pls help
Same situation is happening with me. I get the please wait loading screen and then nothing happens and I go back to the main league screen.
Did you guys figure it out?
